title: Freedom of the Boomerang
brief_description: Highly commended ” make a stamp come alive” entry to Screen It! A man visiting a post office unwittingly unleashes a magical boomerang into the world. An animated short entered to ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.
